mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, send_date, content_type, view_count, good_btn, bad_btn, is_deleted, ip_address) values (#{title}, #{content}, now(), #{content_type},0 , #{good_btn}, #{bad_btn}, #{is_deleted}, #{ip_address})
mapper.update: update board SET is_deleted = 1 where board_id = #{board_id}
mapper.select: select * from board ORDER BY send_date DESC
